text:
San Francisco, CA, full time. Development Team Lead - Cloud Solutions Coverity http://www.coverity.com/company/careers.html

Our mission is to help developers write better software. We develop world class static analysis technology that automatically finds defects in code. We're ~300 employees strong with ~1100 large companies as customers. But we'd like to expand that to every developer on the planet.

In this role you’ll lead the development team that will make our technology accessible to the world. You’ll need these skills to succeed:

- A go-to language for the web that you know very well. It can be Java, Ruby, Python, Scala, or something else. This is a hands-on position.

- Front-end experience in HTML5, JavaScript, CSS.

- You’ve worked with IAAS like Amazon Web Services or similar.

- Experience providing technical leadership to a small, focused group of developers.

Years of experience and academic degrees matters less for this role than the maturity of your skills.

We serve developers throughout the world. If that’s your passion – let’s talk.

Send email to andy at coverity dot com.
